title: Ikkyuu-san to Yancha Hime
synopsis: Ikkyuu must talk a tomboy into behaving in a more lady-like manner before her habit of calling herself by the boy's name Tsuyumaru and attacking shogun Yoshimitsu Ashikaga with a wooden sword gets her into trouble.
staff: [['Yabuki, Kimio', ['Director']], ['Tsuji, Masaki', ['Screenplay']], ['Shirato, Takeshi', ['Animation Director']], ['Kageyama, Isamu', ['Art Director']]]
